attributes.additional_details: People make mistakes and in this case, several have paid for those mistakes with their jobs. Newsnight should be saved, as it has decades of great work behind it and a brand that I feel I shall be able to trust again. Along with Channel 4 News, it is the only quality daily news programme left. Heaven help us if all we end up with is the celeb led news of some of the commercial channels!  Save Newsnight.

rejection.details: Responsibility for what is broadcast on television and radio rests with the broadcasters and the organisations which regulate broadcasting - the Office of Communications (OFCOM), the BBC Trust and the Welsh Fourth Channel Authority (S4C). They are independent of the Government.
